alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Collier, southeastern Hendry and northern Broward Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 7 miles southwest of Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, or 25 miles east of Ave Maria, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Miccosukee Service Plaza and Big Cypress National Preserve. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
